pullrequest.title: Logging Part 1: Misc changes to ignition transport

content.raw:
For other reviewers, I'd like to point out that these functions were removed because they did not have definitions (i.e. if someone tried to call these functions, they would get a linker error).

Rather than giving definitions to these functions, I think it's sufficient to allow users to access this information through a const-qualified `Options()` function, so we've removed the declarations altogether and made `Options()` a public const function.
content.html:
For other reviewers, I'd like to point out that these functions were removed because they did not have definitions (i.e. if someone tried to call these functions, they would get a linker error).

Rather than giving definitions to these functions, I think it's sufficient to allow users to access this information through a const-qualified Options() function, so we've removed the declarations altogether and made Options() a public const function.
